CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1939, pg, 4, reads: "Lovely Mermaids in Newly Formed Aqua Club - The members of the newly organized 'Y' Aqua club, who will greet the splashers in the Centre Avenue 'Y' pool, on January 1, at the season's opening party, from 2 to 5:30 p.m.  Reading, left to right: Margaret Tardy, Catherine Bolden, Delores [Dolores] McCoy, Elizabeth Lee, Norma Johnson, Jean McCoy, Ruth Sharp [Sharpe], and Genevieve Howard.  Missing from the picture are Eugenia Strolger, Beatrice Jackson, Minerva and Beatrice Williams, Vivian Miller and Thelma Lightfoot."
TitMainTitle: Aqua Club members Margaret Tardy, Catherine Bolden, Dolores McCoy (Taylor), Elizabeth Lee, Norma Johnson, Jean McCoy, Ruth Sharpe, and Genevieve Howard, wearing bathing suits and posed at edge of Centre Avenue YMCA swimming pool
